channel.title: Comments on: Integration in Berlin: Research for a Desolate Landscape
channel.description: See Berlin through a lens of migration and difference

item.title: By: collidoscope berlin
item.dc:creator: collidoscope berlin
item.description: good point! we just hope the support is dialogue-rich, with research results feeding back into the law-making and program-creating arms of government. and there is nothing wrong with a little bit of light alliteration now and again :)
item.content:encoded: good point! we just hope the support is dialogue-rich, with research results feeding back into the law-making and program-creating arms of government. and there is nothing wrong with a little bit of light alliteration now and again ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Max S.
item.dc:creator: Max S.
item.description: also, i can't stop alliterating. SOMEONE HELP ME
item.content:encoded: also, i can’t stop alliterating. SOMEONE HELP ME

item.title: By: Max S.
item.dc:creator: Max S.
item.description: the fact that there is governmental support of the center from its founding is promising, to me. when that initial buy-in is absent, the ivory tower usually remains isolated & ignored. hopefully BIM won't run into such issues.
item.content:encoded: the fact that there is governmental support of the center from its founding is promising, to me. when that initial buy-in is absent, the ivory tower usually remains isolated & ignored. hopefully BIM won’t run into such issues.
